blog.name: jcinkgalore

blog.description: jcink galore is a jcink resource tumblr for roleplay advertising and player interaction. we feature an advertising base, as well as a way to build community between jcink roleplayers. we only accept jcink hosted sites.

summary: you wear a different face to each atrocity. you are un-unified and tangled. are you just gluttony? are you civilization’s slow...

you wear a different face to each atrocity.
you are un-unified and tangled.

summary: CALLING ALL OC PEOPLE
body:
CALLING ALL OC PEOPLE

DOES ANYONE WANT THEIR OC TO BE PART OF A STUPID HOGWARTS MYSTERY NEXT GEN PLOT?

SLOTS FOR CHILDREN ARE PRETTY LIMITED SO FIRST COME FIRST SERVE.

List of currently taken characters

Merula Snyde (Demetra Cox) (courtesy of @theevilcox

Felix Rosier (Michael Rosier,Connor Rosier,Nadine Rosier)

Chester Davies (Diana Davies) (I’m thinking of making Di’s mom get killed due to the 2nd Wizarding War so he’s still open!)

summary: After a swift victory over a much more qualified candidate who mysteriously “pulled out for personal reasons” Donvolio Burke...
caption:
After a swift victory over a much more qualified candidate who mysteriously “pulled out for personal reasons” Donvolio Burke took his place as President of the Magical Congress of the United States of America. He immediately proposed laws that forced No-Maj and Wizard marriages to be declared to the government, with future marriages now needing written approval by the government. His new push for laws that ban No-Maj borns from attending Illvermorny has been met with uproar by the majority of the public, and has been stalled in the Magical Congress for the last 2 years. With the marauders set to return to school, the students of Ilvermorny can only try to go on living their lives as usual.

                               ILVERMORNY . 2018

         HOME // FULL PLOT // NAVIGATION

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Rose Weasley, Louis Weasley, Albus Potter, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!

blog.name: incorrect-professors
blog.title: incorrect hogwarts professor quotes
blog.description: incorrect quotes (or are they totally correct?) said by the professors of hogwarts school of witchcraft and wizardry. (brought to you by the admins of incorrect-marauders.)

summary:
Sirius: I got a 69 on my last test! Do you think Minnie's trying to tell me something? (winks) 
McGonagall: Yeah, I'm trying to...
body:
Sirius: I got a 69 on my last test! Do you think Minnie's trying to tell me something? (winks) 
McGonagall: Yeah, I'm trying to tell you to pay attention in class!

dialogue.name: Sirius
dialogue.label: Sirius:
dialogue.phrase: I got a 69 on my last test! Do you think Minnie's trying to tell me something? (winks)

dialogue.name: McGonagall
dialogue.label: McGonagall:
dialogue.phrase: Yeah, I'm trying to tell you to pay attention in class!

summary: I am an idiot.
body:
I am an idiot.

Do you know how stupid I feel right now?

And why do I feel stupid? Well, because just now at 3:37am it finally occurred to me that ROWAN is a type of tree. And not just any type of tree, one whose wood is used for making wands.

And why do I feel extremely and particularly stupid? Well that’s because MY FREAKING WAND is made of ROWAN wood and is sitting on my freaking bookshelf and I still didn’t make the connection between Rowan Khanna, the witch who grew up on a tree farm, and a Rowan tree!!!

I am an idiot.

summary: Senses of Magic - darkseraphina - Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling [Archive of Our Own]
title: Senses of Magic - darkseraphina - Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 1/1
Fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling, The Sentinel
Rating: Not Rated
Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
Relationships: Sirius Black & Harry Potter
Characters: Sirius Black, Harry Potter, Female Harry Potter - Character, female harry - Character, Hermione Granger, Ron Weasley, Neville Longbottom, Rubeus Hagrid, Goblins (Harry Potter), Ragnok (Harry Potter), Original Characters, Original Female Character(s), Original Goblin Characters, Minerva McGonagall, Severus Snape, Albus Dumbledore, Poppy Pomfrey, Quirinus Quirrell, Voldemort, Draco Malfoy, Narcissa Black Malfoy, Molly Weasley, Percy Weasley, Hermione’s parents - Character, Hogwarts Students
Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Always a Different Sex, Alternate Universe - Gender Changes, Alternate Universe - Sentinels and Guides Are Known, Sentinel Senses, Sentinel/Guide Bonding, Sentinel Prides, Politics, Goblins, being BAMF, BAMF Sirius, The Golden Trio, Plus Neville, Worldbuilding, Manipulative Dumbledore, Molly Weasley Bashing, grownups paying attention, and solving problems before kids have to, responsible adults, Gender-Neutral Pronouns, Feminist Themes, discussion of sexual violence, Friendship, asskicking, Wizarding World, Wizarding Politics, Rule 63
Series: Part 3 of Sentinel Fusions
Summary:

Ellie Potter’s introduction to the magical world is a little more complicated than intended. No one, not even Dumbledore, expected the Girl-Who-Lived to Awaken as a sentinel. Which just goes to show you how little wizards understand Sentinels – nothing like being thrust into a new world, filled with dangers and enemies to Awaken a sentinel’s instincts.

Goblins have little use for wizards, but sentinels and guides are another matter entirely. Sentinels are warriors; ruthless, fierce, and without mercy on the battlefield. The kind of being a Goblin can respect. So when the Girl-Who-Lived comes into the bank, Awakening…well. There’s little they could do to aid an underaged witch without a magical guardian. A Sentinel? Anyone who tries to interfere in affairs between Sentinels and Guides and the Horde courts war.

Ellie leaves Gringotts with far more than she might have. The goblins send her off, already plotting. Change is coming. A storm is building. There will be profit and battle in the coming days.

summary:
Harry: Aww, what are you doing here all but yourself, little one?
Kitty: Meow
Harry: Come home with me, I'll make you something...
body:
Harry: Aww, what are you doing here all but yourself, little one?
Kitty: Meow
Harry: Come home with me, I'll make you something yummy, yes?
Kitty: Meow
Harry: Here, have these sardines 
Kitty *transforms into Draco*: You find the most beautiful and adorable cat in the world and you're about to feed it with those rancid sardines? You deserve the worst, Potter
